__meta__.description: This file contains base64 encoded image data, corresponding text, and various configuration data, such as animation speed.

frog.text: Mayhap a hidden door lurks nigh? Let us search the environs.
Thou hast lost thy friend before thine eyes; there art no words to comfort thee.
Ma'am, thou'rt mistaken, I'm not a pet, I'm a Knight and master swordsman.

imp.text: Did you guys just come out of the closet? Get out of here!

melchior.text: Your actions may either save or destroy life. Wield your sword with full knowledge of the consequen- ces!

nu.text: All life begins with Nu and ends with Nu. This is the truth! This is my belief.. At least for now.

queen_zeal.text: Behold, my pretties! Destiny, in its most brutal form. All the dreams that might have been. All the happiness and sorrow you might have experienc- ed. Gone forever!!! For you there will be no tomorrow!

gaspar.text: To bring back lost loved ones... It's what everyone wants... Crono must be proud... to have friends like you...
Just as you touch the energy of every life form you meet, so, too, will their energy strengthen you. Fail to live up to your potential, and you will never win.

flea.text: Male... female..... what's the difference? Power is beautiful, and I've got the power!

doreen.text: Am I butterfly dreaming I'm a man? Or a bowling ball dreaming I'm a plate of sashimi? Never assume what you see and feel is real!
I'm Doreen. Seek the hidden path, and open the doors of knowledge, each in turn.

belthazar.text: It all began aeons ago, when man's ancestors picked up a shard of strange red rock. Its power, which was beyond human comprehen- sion, cultivated dreams... in turn, love and hate were born... Only time will see how it all ends.

marle.text: Crono!! We can't keep sponging off my dad! Go and get a job!!
I didn't "pick up" anything from outside! It's called "common sense!"
It was awful. I can't recall it all... I was somewhere cold, dark, and lonely. Is that what it's like to... die?

magus.text: The black wind howls... One among you will shortly perish...
Don't waste your time. Alfador only likes me.
I  survived the Darkness to  defeat you!
Oh, how dreadful. Say, do you hear that?   It's the sound of the Reaper...
We were created only to be harvested. All people... and all living things... It's over for you... Your life ends here!

robo.text: Good morning, mistress. What is your command?
Name? Ah, my serial number.   It is R66-Y.
The Time Gyro says... What!? 12,000 years in the past?! That was some trip!

lucca.text: Machines aren't capable of evil. Humans make them that way.
All of our history... our art and science... All to meet the needs of that... beast.
Where have they been keeping her!?

ayla.text: Ayla fight while alive!    Win and live.    Lose and die.    Rule of life.       No change rule.
Old man breathe, but dead on inside!
No rubbish for Ayla, or head go boom!
Ayla's word! "La" mean fire. "Vos" mean big.

crono.text: HP/MP restored! But you're still hungry.

nun.text: We want nothing but world peace...   or a piece of the world, tee hee...
